title: Op. Save Stanton: Support Cargo Recovery
description:
ECKHART SECURITY, LLC.
CONTRACTS & DISPATCH

CONTRACT TYPE: Cargo Retrieval
CONTRACTOR STATUS: Independent
Approval code: = ~mission(approvalcode)


Since you’ve already successfully completed a similar job, I’m hoping you’re available to help on this one. Your experience and expertise could be the difference between success or failure. 

I have another contractor working at ~mission(Location|Address) to recover cargo from an attacked ship, but the reports coming in make it clear the hostiles in the area aren’t going to let them do it without a fight.    

Considering the escalation of danger, and the importance of recovering the cargo, I’ve been authorized to hire additional contractors to support the operation. If you’re interested and available, you’ll need to help locate the destroyed ship at ~mission(Location) and repel any other forces attempting to grab the cargo. When the shipment is secured, it needs to be delivered to the designated delivery location.

You know the drill since you’ve already done one of these ops, but I’m gonna say it again anyways. I recommend that you come well equipped and prepared to fight.    

Payment will be issued upon successful completion of contract.

This contract is non-negotiable.

This message may contain confidential, proprietary, privileged and/or private information. The information is intended to be for the use of the individual or entity designated above.
